integration_patterns: Data streaming integration with healthcare apps

evidence.claim: AllegianceMD utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The platform is HIPAA compliant ensuring the security of health data.
Integration with Twilio for secure communication services.
Supports HL7 and FHIR standards for health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: AllegianceMD integrates with X12 transactions and emphasizes API solutions for healthcare.
matched_use_cases: Integration with EHR systems using X12
